choices: Both Predator and Prey or Human
1.content: What kind of Character do we have here? Virtuous or Condemned? Predator or Prey?
1.title: Welcome to the Afterlife

13.content: What kind of prey animal?
13.title: Condemned Prey

15.content: Get the combo of benefits or punishments here.
15.title: Both Predator and Prey or Human

152.content:
Alfred Witmore

Was a zookeeper working with a lot of animals, although his favorites were the Big Cats. His life came to a halt when he became the victim of a car accident. Upon finding himself in the Afterlife, he is initially puzzled, until he encounters a tigress that had lived, and died, at the zoo during the time he'd been there.

Susan Jennings

A fantasy novelist, who was in Alaska, doing first-hand studying on polar bears, planning to incorporate them into her next book in some fashion, on the basis that scientific books and movies and animals in zoos weren't enough to motivate her, when tragedy, in the form of boating accident, occurred. She has since found herself in an area similar to Alaska, with a number of Arctic creatures around, including polar bears.

Eric Roberts

A priest for many years, Eric died of one of the things that Science, and God, couldn't cure, cancer. Expecting to see the Pearly Gates, and hear angels singing, at the very least, Eric is more than a bit confused at the differences.
152.title: Virtuous Human

choices: Sasha wants to have some fun with Alfred.
1521.content:
Alfred looked around. He remembered the car hitting him, but then, nothing much.

But now, he was in a rather strange location. It reminded him of some sort of jungle.

It puzzled him. On the plus side, it wasn't all fire and brimstone, like what Hell would be, yet at the same time, it wasn't like there were angels sitting on clouds singing hymns. Of course, that might have also have been a bit of a blessing, as Alfred knew that he wasn't the most religious of people, and felt that an eternity of such music might actually be worse than Hell itself. Still, he wondered where he was.

That was when he saw the tiger. He could see that the tiger was looking at him. He gulped as he watched it. Having worked at a zoo, he knew about the power of such creatures. He wasn't exactly sure, but it looked looked like a Bengal Tiger. More importantly, the pattern of the stripes seemed eerily familiar.

The tiger began to walk up to him.

Alfred knew that the best thing he needed was some sort of weapon, and being in a forest, with plenty of trees, there was always improvised clubs and spears to be had, especially since he saw a decent sized branch. Grabbing it, he ripped it off the tree, and thrust the one end towards the tiger. On that particular end was what looked like a bunch of mangos. It would have been funny, actually, if not for the fact that he was focused on protecting himself.

The tiger stopped, and laid down. "Don't you recognize me, Alfred?" it asked, in a female-sounding voice.

Alfred blinked. "You talk?"

The tiger chuckled. "Of course I do. Don't you talk?"

"How?" Alfred asked.

"It's the Afterlife," the tiger said. "Allows for Communication, among other things."

"How do you know my name?" Alfred asked.

"Two years ago, remember," the tiger said. "You worked at the zoo I resided at. I was sick. You spent a lot of nights at the place, trying to help the veterinarians help me try to get better. Didn't work, obviously, but I remember you, sitting by me, reading one of those books."

Recognition came to Alfred. "Sasha?"

The tiger got up. "You remember now?"

Alfred nodded. "Um, what happens now?"

Sasha chuckled. "Well, if you're hungry, I could help you to split open those mangos. Virtuous Prey seem to enjoy them."

"Virtuous Prey?" Alfred asked.

"Predators have to eat too," said Sasha. "Got to eat Prey."

"Um, is this Heaven or Hell?" Alfred asked.

"Both, or Neither," said Sasha. "I'm not sure. You have the Virtuous, who have lived a Good life, and you have the Condemned, who didn't. I hope that you lived a Good life. You smell like one who did."

"Well, I know I wasn't Perfect, but I think that I was mostly good," said Alfred.

"There is a few simple tests that you could do to figure out if you're Virtuous, or Condemned," Sasha said, as she came up to him, and knocked a mango off of the branch. She then split the rind, pulled it off of some of the fruit's flesh, and passed the rest to him. "If you're Virtuous, it tastes like one of the best mangos you've ever eaten. If you're Condemned, apparently, it tastes like plain tofu."

Alfred picked it up. "Well, I've had mangos, and I've had tofu, so I know the difference." He took a bite of the flesh, and his eyes widened. "This is better than any mango I've ever had!"

Sasha chuckled. "I'm glad I was right about you."

"So, what happens now?" Alfred asked.
1521.title: Alfred Witmore - Zookeeper

choices: Alfred and Sasha watch the rain
They aren't the only ones in the cave.
15212.content:
That was when Alfred heard a rumble of thunder, and rain started to fall.

Alfred looked up, and saw a number of dark clouds. "Can't say I expected that!"

Sasha chuckled. "Having it be sunny and cloudless all the time gets boring."

Alfred looked at himself, noting how wet he was getting, as well as a distinct lack of clothing. "So, what do we do?"

"By the looks of things, it's going to rain for a while," said Sasha. "Come with me. I know of a cave." She started walking away.

Alfred followed. "Thanks. Also, do you know where there's clothes that I could wear?"

"Sure, if you don't mind looking like something out of one of those caveman movies," said Sasha. "There's a distinct lack of anything really advanced beyond Stone Age type of technology."

"Um, what are the clothes made out of?" Alfred asked.

Sasha chuckled. "Hide of course. I'm sure that mine could fit you."

Alfred's eyes widened. "You'd let someone kill and skin you, just to make me some clothes?"

"It's not too bad," said Sasha. "I would reform afterwards. Besides, you might want some meat to eat anyways."

"I don't think that I could go through with that," said Alfred. "I mean, does every animal here talk?"

"Yes," said Sasha. "It's nothing personal, for the most part. You might even like my meat."

"I don't think that I could do that to someone I know," said Alfred.

"Suit yourself," said Sasha. "Still, once you get tired of plant matter, I know of plenty of cattle, pigs, sheep, goats, and other Virtuous Prey animals, whom you might find to be tasty."

"And you don't mind this?" Alfred asked.

"They don't feel any pain, if that's what you're worried about," said Sasha. "Some even get a kick out of it."

"You mentioned Virtuous," said Alfred. "What about the other group, the Condemned, right?"

"They feel pain," said Sasha. "They are to suffer."

"What did they do to be Condemned?" Alfred asked.

"Killing just to kill, basically," said Sasha. "That or were very gluttonous, eating more than they needed to, or greedy, and horded way more than they needed, causing unneeded pain and suffering."

"How do they suffer?" Alfred asked.

"Let's just say that if I was a Condemned Predator, I wouldn't be able to catch you if you tried to escape from me," said Sasha. "If you were Condemned, you wouldn't be able to escape me."

"So, just what am I, exactly?" Alfred asked.

"Humans count as both Predator and Prey," said Sasha. "A number of smaller Carnivores and Omnivores have both classifications of Predator and Prey if there's something that can eat them and they can eat smaller animals."

"So, the Food Web thing is, more or less, intact, basically?" Alfred asked.

"Some could say that," said Sasha. "Of course, one thing that you might want to get used to is the fact that you aren't the Apex Predator, as it were."

"So, you could eat me, right?" Alfred asked.

"I could, but only if you give me permission to do so," said Sasha. "There's something of a 'No means No' rule. You say 'Yes', and I could chow down on you. You say 'No', and I'd have to respect it, even if you said 'Yes' a moment prior."

"I see," said Alfred.

"Got the same rule where sex is concerned," said Sasha. "I'd have to ask if you wanted to have sex with me, and respect your wishes if you said 'No'."

"Wait, you could have sex with me?" Alfred asked.

Sasha chuckled. "Sometimes male tigers aren't interested at the moment, same with other male big cats, and one just needs that itch to get scratched."

"I'm sure that there's a few rules against that sort of thing," said Alfred.

"Only when it isn't consensual," said Sasha. "Other than that, anything goes."

"Sounds crazy," said Alfred.

Sasha chuckled. "Well, if you can't find a female human, but want to have sex anyways, let me know. I can, at the very least, take the edge off."

"Let's file that for another time," said Alfred.

Sasha chuckled. She then looked ahead. "There's the cave. Should keep us dry, and we can watch the rain. Afterwards, I'll introduce you to the others around here."
15212.title: It starts to rain

choices: Alfred accepts Sasha's offer to lay on him.
Alfred accepts Sasha's offer. Then he gets curious about her body
Alfred accepts Sasha's offer, only for her to get hungry while she's on him.
152122.content:
After he got into the cave, Alfred started to shiver.

"Are you alright?" Sasha asked.

"Just a little cold," Alfred said. "I'm just not used to walking around naked in the rain."

Sasha chuckled. "Don't worry too much. I know of some people who will be able to help out with the whole clothes thing."

"I don't think that I could go through with someone killing you to make clothes for me," Alfred said, as he sat down. "I don't like the idea of it."

"There's other hides you could wear," said Sasha. "In the meantime, how about I help you to warm up?"

"How are you going to do that?" Alfred asked.

Sasha laid down beside him. "Just lay down, and I'll take care of the rest."

Alfred looked her over. "Are you going to lay on top of me?"

"That's the general idea," said Sasha. "It tends to do the trick."

"Is all you going to do is just lay on me?" Alfred asked.

"Well, we could go a little further if you want to," said Sasha, with a chuckle. "Your choice of course. You could refuse my offer as well."
152122.title: Alfred feels cold

choices: Alfred accepts the offer for her hide
Alfred notices that she is hungry and decides to trust her, and let her eat
1521223.content:
Alfred nods, shivering. “Help me out, with the cold. Please.”

With that, Alfred lays himself down on the cave floor.

Sasha follows Alfred’s direction a moment later, standing over him on all fours.

The tigress standing over Alfred, delays only momentarily, licking her chops. A bit oh drool lands on Alfred’s chest.

After shaking off her predatory urges, true to her word, she lowers herself down upon him, embracing him with her soft fur and warm body.

After minutes of awkward silence: Alfred’s shivering comes to a stop.

“I really appreciate this Sasha…” Alfred says, stroking her neck.

“You were so good to me in life, it’s the least I could do.” Sasha’s stomach moans a bit while on top of Alfred.

“You know, I really wound not mind, giving you my hide, for other nights, not that I don’t mind doing this.” Sasha continued.
1521223.title: Alfred accepts Sasha's offer, only for her ...

choices: Alfred, feeds himself, and fashions clothing, Sasha is reborn
15212231.content:
“How would I even take your hide unarmed like this? Humans need tools you know.”

“How am I supposed to kill a tiger with my bare hands?”

“Good point…”, She responded, taking a moment to ponder, still laying atop of Alfred.

“Ahh I know!”, Her ears perked up. “The sharp rocks.”

“There are some in the cave.”, she continued, without a bit of hesitation.

“This doesn’t bother you at all?”, Alfred asked, still pinned under her chest, with a large paw holding the back of his head.

“No, this is normal here, and I would love to help you, you where so good to me in life.”

Lifting herself to all fours, the tigress relinquishes her pin on Alfred, letting the cold air sweep in. This reminded Alfred of why the hide was needed. Sasha sauntered away, into another corner of the cave standing over a deposit of obsidian.

Alfred, following behind, realizing the gruesome reality of what would have to take place saw the blade like stones between Sasha’s paws.

“Really, its not that big of a deal.”, Sasha said cheerfully, rubbing her muzzle against his bare thy as he reached for the stone blade, hands shaking.
Sasha gracefully circled back around lowering her head to Alfred, without any sign of hesitation.

Alfred’s hands shook at the thought.

“I promise you, its fine!”, Sasha said reassuringly.

Alfred pressed the stone into the side of her neck, not breaking the skin; Sasha did not even flinch.

Petting the scruff around her neck, Alfred believed his companion.

“Ill see you soon.” Sasha said as the stone made its way into the side of her neck, severing something important.

Sasha calmly laid down, waiting for sleep to overtake her as the blood drained from her body, holding his scent in her mind.
15212231.title: Alfred accepts the offer for her hide

152122311.content:
As soon as sleep overtook her, Sasha found herself awake in grassy clearing, alone and hungry.

It was as if no time passed at all.

The wind jostled her mane as she peered out over the moonlit clearing. The tigress closed her eyes, holding Alfred’s scent in her mind, noting their friendship, and the fact that he would make a delectable meal.

She was glad to have helped him, she meant it, he was a good man.

Putting her nose to the air, drawing in the scent, the tigress began her hunt.

***

Alfred, having finished the gruesome task of skinning his companion and filling himself with her flesh, he looked down at the eviscerated remains of Sasha.

Alfred trembled momentarily; he could feel a lump forming in his throat.

Alfred quickly looked away, taking up Sasha’s uncured hide.

Making his way to the mouth of the cave, Alfred realized the sun would rise soon, and the rain had slowed to a mere trickle. Alfred set
the hide to dry in the soon to be rising sun. Looking down at his hands, he realized they were soaked in gore.

The sound of a nearby stream caught his attention, he knew he could wash off there. Alfred made his way to the source of the trickling sound and bent down at the side of the stream to clean himself. The sun was rising now, revealing more and more details of his surroundings.

“Alfred?”, proclaimed a feminine voice behind him.
152122311.title: Alfred, feeds himself, and fashions clothing, S...

choices: Alfred repays her favor, allowing Sasha to hunt him.
Alfred declines, running away from her.
1521223111.content:
Pivoting around Alfred saw the familiar tigress, she was standing elevated above him on a flat rock about ten feet from him. Her heavy musculature gleamed from her striped coat in the fresh morning light, she stood proudly, wind jostling her mane. Her eyes held a certain seriousness that Alfred had only seen few times.

“Your alive!”, Alfred exclaimed.

“You didn’t believe me?”, She asked, keeping her proud posture.

Alfred walked towards her, to the base of her stone. A rivulet of drool fell from her maw, as she eyed him menacingly. Alfred knew her hunger had not been sated.

“Your still naked…” Sasha growled, looking him over.

“The… hide is, drying”, Alfred answered sheepishly.

“Alfred… I have something to ask you? C-Can I hunt you?”, The tigress asked timidly, but directly.
1521223111.title: Sasha has found him

choices: Sasha consumes Alfred, then he is reborn
15212231111.content:
“Sasha… I would be honored.”, Alfred says without hesitation, knowing that she is telling the truth, and that she had already sacrificed so much for him.

Alfred reached up to scratch his tigress behind the ear. Her jaw quivered, drooling, trying not to take a bite of him so soon.

Her mane puffed up aggressively, as she roared directly in Alfred’s face, revealing the true size and power of her enormous maw. The man’s ears where left ringing, as he stood there awaiting his fate.

Surprisingly, her breath was pleasant, something expected of a carnivore but, none the less clean.

“Alfred… run from me please… it’s better that way, fight back.”, Sasha stated gently before licking his cheek, and gently pushing him away with a massive paw.

Alfred turned tail and began to jog away deeper into the jungle. Sasha simply watched him leave, laying down on her perch, intending to give him a head start.

Running for about ten minutes, Alfred figured he had put some good distance on the beast. His feet and naked body already having signs of damage from navigating the brush. Stopping to catch his breath Alfred thought to himself, “She won’t find me here!”

Minutes went by, it was practically silent. Only sounds of the jungle, and the wind.

Eventually, Alfred heard a disturbance in the brush, and decided to keep going.

Mildly afraid, but mostly trying to put on a good show for Sasha, Alfred made a break for a clearing up ahead.

Just then, Alfred could hear the snapping of branches, and the crunching of the forest floor, something large was in pursuit. Out of the corner of his eye, he could see flashes of orange, black, and white. No doubt it was his tigress. The memory of her massive maw permeated his mind allowing him to run faster.

But, not as fast of the tigress.

As Alfred was about to make it to the clearing, she had gained on him enough to leap for his backside. Feeling claws tear into his lower back, Alfred fell face first into the clearing, landing face first on loamy sand. A moment later, Sasha’s jaws had seized his ankle, dragging him backwards, towards herself while growling ferociously.

Pivoting to his back, Alfred grabbed a handful of sand, casting it into Sasha’s bright eyes.

She immediately let go of her hold and was blinded for the moment.

“I’m going to tear you apart!”, Sasha roared in anger, lashing out at the darkness with a massive swipe of the paw.

Alfred took the opportunity to limp away, doing the best he could do with his mangled ankle. Taking shelter behind some large river
rocks. Alfred peeked over watching Sasha struggle to find her way around, roaring and pacing in anger.

Gaining back her composure, Sasha abruptly stopped her display of anger, pointing her nose to the sky. She realized how her heart was beating, reveling in the moment. She took a deep breath through her nose, a deep breath of Alfred.

“I can’t wait to taste you Alfred!” Sasha taunted, standing proud, yet blind. She began blinking, each time restoring more and more of her vision.

Once her eyesight returned to her Alfred was nowhere to be seen. However, she could smell him nearby. Sasha hoped atop of a large river rock, seeing Alfred at the base.

Recoiling from the base of the rock, Alfred smiled holding a club in a defensive posture, while stepping back into the ankle deep water.

“Cute stick!”, Sasha jeered, jumping down into the water, sending up a splash.

They circled each other, locked in a friendly, yet deadly combat.

Sasha swung her powerful claw at the club, sending it flying 6 feet away. Alfred hesitated momentarily, making a slight motion towards the club.

Sasha saw his as her opportunity, leaping upon her keeper. The weight and claws of the tigress brought the man to his back in the shallow water. He quickly reached for the club, but Sasha intercepted his reach, by pinning his forearm down with her claws.

Alfred’s blood faintly stained the water as he looked up at her, breathing heavily, soaking wet, and salivating.

Watching as Sasha’s maw come upon upon him, Alfred felt nothing as its darkness enveloped him. The last thing he remembered was a faint twist of the neck.
15212231111.title: Alfred repays her favor, allowing Sasha to hunt...

152122311111.content:
Sasha released her jaws clamped on her prey, panting. She looked down over Alfred’s body, she figured that he put up a good fight.

It had been such a long time since she had a hunt like that. She had a new respect for Alfred, perhaps if he had been better armed, she figured she might have found herself on the loosing end of that hunt.

Sasha looked down at the naked lifeless body of her keeper, licking the blood from her lips. It was fantastic. She couldn’t help but love him more, for being such a good sport.

For a moment, she wished that she had not killed him so efficiently, instead toying with him a bit more.

Grabbing her lifeless prey by the neck, she drug the lifeless man out of the shallow river, to the warm shoreline, already salivating over the thought of digging into her keeper.

Sniffing him over from head to toe Sasha took her time, familiarizing herself with his body. Tasting his blood, the river water, and sweat of his skin with many caresses of the tongue.

Finally, she could wait no longer, the hunger gnawed at tigress and she had to give in. So, she ferociously began the process of disassembling her beloved keeper, gorging herself with every part of this man.

After consuming every inch of Alfred throughout the course of the day, the gore laden tigress opted to enjoy the afternoon sun, grooming and bathing. Her new respect for Alfred lead her to figure, that he would likely find her once he reformed himself. But, if not she would find him.
152122311111.title: Sasha consumes Alfred, then he is reborn

1521223111111.content:
As if no time had passed at all, Alfred found himself in a clearing of the dense jungle; cold, naked, and alone. Yet, it was a beautiful moonlit night and the soft mossy ground was pleasant to the feet. He had no idea where he was at first.

Looking himself over, the injuries he sustained as prey to the tigress where now nonexistent.

Remembering the trajectory of the moon from his previous night in the afterlife, Alfred opted to head for the direction that he believed to be the location of his tigress.

***
The tigress by this point, a bit bored, awaiting Alfred’s return, was wading deeper into the same shallow stream, that she took her last kill in. She planned to bathe here to clean herself up for the return of her human companion.

After a sufficient amount of bathing, and grooming of her vital parts, she opted to shake off, and head for a warm stone to dry off on. She could feel her coat drying, and fluffing up, Sasha wondered if Alfred got lost.

“Guess who?”, An all too familiar voice jeered, as a pair of hands grabbed hold of her damp scruff on her back.

“My breakfast?”, Sasha retorted with a playful chuff, already knowing it was Alfred.

“I skinned you, remember?”, Alfred replied as Sasha rolled to her back, pulling him down to her damp chest.

“Man… I have smelled wet dog before, but wet cat?”, Alfred continued, as he wrapped his arms around her chest, running his fingers through her damp fur.

Sasha chuckled a bit, unoffended, licking the top of his head. The tigress pulled the man closer, enjoying his scent and the warmth of the sun, not planning on letting him go any time soon.
1521223111111.title: Alfred finds his way back

choices: Sasha consumes the body, Alfred is reborn
15212232.content:
Alfred was aware of Sasha’s hunger; he had spent a long time reading her body language in life. In death she was trying to keep it from him.

“Sasha…”

“Hmm…”, She replied, flitting her tail, still holding Alfred.

With a shaky voice Alfred continued, “I figure, you aren’t lying to me… We are dead… this is the afterlife. And… I, uh… trust you. I can see you have gone awhile without a good meal...”

“Hunger is something that seems to remain here.”, Sasha replied. Her nose at work taking in Alfred’s scent, holding him possessively.

By this point, the claws of the tigress where pressed firmly against the bare flesh of Alfred, as if to hold him. The man could not feel them, nor did they pierce his flesh.

“Sasha… you offered yourself to me, I believe you, you can have me.”

In that same instant, Sasha’s claws pierced Alfred’s bare flesh. Sasha was not lying he felt no pain as they dug deep into his muscle fibers, yielding rivulets of crimson blood.

“Thank you...”, She replied gently looking down at the man, before caressing his throat with her large tongue, tickling his chest with her whiskers.

Looking him the eye one last time Sasha gently wrapped her maw around her prey’s throat, pressing her fangs gently to his bare neck. His heart was obviously racing.
Sasha slowly tightened her grip, clamping down her maw, little by little.

As the fangs entered, Alfred felt no pain, he could only feel her warm breath on his neck. Once again it was as she said. Warm crimson blood splashed onto his chest and into Sasha’s maw.

She held him there for a while, unrelenting as the life left his eyes, all the while she looked down at him with a gentle expression.
15212232.title: Alfred notices that she is hungry and decides t...

152122321.content:
It had been so long since Sasha had a proper meal here.

Sasha looked down at the naked lifeless body of her keeper, licking the blood from her lips. It was fantastic. She couldn’t help but love him more, for such a trusting act like that.

Momentary, she wished that he was alive for this.

Sniffing him over from head to toe Sasha took her time, familiarizing herself with his body. Tasting his blood and sweat with many caresses of the tongue.

Finally, she could wait no longer, the hunger gnawed at tigress and she had to give in. So, she methodically began the process of disassembling her beloved keeper, savoring every part of this man.

***
As if no time had passed at all, Alfred found himself in a clearing of the dense jungle; cold, naked, and alone. Yet, it was a beautiful moonlit night and the soft mossy ground was pleasant to the feet. He had no idea where he was and figured, it would be better to wait out the night.

Alfred simply stood there. The last thing he remembered was Sasha’s warm embrace, it really wasn’t unpleasant. He waited in the area for hours, listening to the creatures of the night, and thinking about his time with that cat.

Suddenly, Alfred was disturbed from his thoughts, by a noise in the brush.
152122321.title: Sasha consumes the body, Alfred is reborn

1521223211.content:
After consuming most of Alfred, down to a few bones, Sasha, pleasantly slept, stained in blood, with thoughts of her beloved prey and keeper in her mind.

She awoke to a hissing sound. Cracking an eye, the tigress watched as what little was left of Alfred began to disintegrate.

Knowing that he was reforming, she stood up, with his scent still fresh in her mind, it was time to start the hunt.

Following his scent for several hours, padding through jungle, mud, and underbrush, the scent finally became strong enough where, she knew that her prey must be close by.

Coming upon a clearing in the jungle, she spotted him, her beloved keeper, once again naked, and illuminated by the moon. She knew that she could see him perfectly well but, his human eyes would be unable to detect her. In her excitement the seasoned predator made an error, stepping on a dried branch, yielding a snap.

***
Bursting from the brush a powerful feline form had taken Alfred to his back, with a loud roar, in only an instant after he heard the commotion. The impact wasn’t painful nor did claws harm him.

Momentarily disoriented, Alfred’s eyes came into focus. Alfred was looking up into the glowing eyes of Sasha once again.

“Sasha!” Alfred cried in excitement after shaking off the blow.

Letting out a chuff of happiness, Sasha stroked her keeper’s cheek with her raspy tongue, then proceeded to rub her muzzle against his chest, marking him as her own.
1521223211.title: It's Sasha

1523.content:
Eric looked around. The place he was in wasn't the Pearly Gates, that much he knew for sure. The place was some sort of forest, or jungle, or something along those lines.

On the plus side, at least it wasn't the Fires of Hell. He would have really been concerned if he'd ended up there.

Also on the plus side, there was some fruits that looked ripe enough to be eaten.

"Perhaps God will show me more of His wonders later," Eric said, as he walked up to a low branch. "After all, it's not like I'm the only one here."

He grabbed one of the fruit, and was about to bite into it when he heard a voice say, "You certainly aren't the only one here."

He looked in the direction of the voice, and found himself looking....
1523.title: Eric Roberts - Priest

choices: "Well, I'm feeling hungry. Do you want to be my meal?"
"Might be a good idea to find you a place to stay."
"Might be a good idea to get you something to wear."
15231.content:
In a scene that seemed to be out of the Book of Eden, or The Jungle Book, Eric found himself looking up at one very large snake.

"What are you?" he asked, dropping the fruit, and backing away. "The Devil in Serpent form?"

The snake chuckled. "A herpetologist described me as a Titianboa, or something along those lines. As for being the Devil, or some other deity of Evil, far from it. I'm one of the Virtuous."

"Virtuous?" Eric asked, as he tried to keep his eyes on the creature, noting it to be well over forty feet long.

"Lived life the right way, basically," the snake said. "Didn't kill more than I needed to, didn't eat more than I needed to. It's sort of easy to figure things out for one such as myself, as we don't need to worry about morality for the most part. Of course, if you ate way too much or killed way too much, then you're at risk of being marked as Condemned."

"Condemned?" Eric asked.

"They suffer punishments," the snake said. "Condemned Predators cannot catch Virtuous Prey, and Condemned Prey cannot outrun Virtuous Predators. Virtuous ones enjoy the taste of what they eat, while the Condemned taste only blandness."

"What do you mean by that?" Eric asked.

"Try the fruit," said the snake. "It should taste like the best papaya you've ever had, or at least taste delicious to you at any rate. Otherwise, it will taste like tofu."

Eric carefully picked up the fruit, and tried it. It was delicious. "This is good."

The snake chuckled. "Good to know."

"So, just how do things work around here?" Eric asked.

"Not too different from how things should work," said the snake. "Predators hunt for Prey, and Prey try to avoid being caught by Predators. Just to let you know, your sort is both Predator and Prey, meaning that you can always capture Condemned Prey, and outrun Condemned Predators, unless you let them catch you."

"Let them catch me?" Eric asked.

"Sometimes one feels sorry for them, and conveniently trips and doesn't get up in time to escape," the snake said. "Of course, Virtuous Prey don't feel any pain when they get eaten."

"What if say a Virtuous Predator came after me?" Eric asked.

The snake chuckled. "Depends on if you gave the Predator permission to eat you or not. If you gave me permission, I could eat you. If you didn't, I'd have to look for someone else."

"What would happen afterwards?" Eric asked.

"Your body would be recreated," the snake said.

"I see," said Eric. "Um, what's your name?"

The snake chuckled. "I prefer to be called Rosa when folks make use of such things."

Eric's eyes widened. "Okay. My name is Eric, Eric Roberts."

"Pleased to meet you," Rosa said.

"So, what now?" Eric asked.

At this, Rosa said.....
15231.title: One Huge Snake!

155.content: Perhaps an Anthro is more to your liking.
155.title: Anthros

info.brief_description: The Afterlife of Animals. It includes Humans. And Anthros.
info.description:
Animals die: this is a Fact. So, the question is; do they go to Heaven, or do they go to Hell? The answer is this - they all go to the same place, but each get different rewards, or punishments, depending on if they were classified as Virtuous, or Condemned. Then there's the humans that have shown up.

The Virtuous enjoy a lot of rewards:

1. They can always find some sort of pleasure. This can be through having fun with friends, eating good food, having sex, and just enjoying things.

2. Virtuous Prey have no problems escaping from Condemned Predators.

3. Virtuous Predators have no problems catching Condemned Prey.

4. Virtuous Predators can eat Virtuous Prey, but there's a "No means No" policy in place - Predators must ask the Prey if they can eat them, and if the Prey refuses, the Predator is to respect it.

5. Virtuous Prey don't suffer any pain if they get eaten. In fact, some actually enjoy being eaten. In fact, they taste better than Condemned Prey.

6. Animals that qualify as both Predator and Prey enjoy both sets of benefits.

7. There aren't many rules were sex is concerned, so long as it's consensual.


The Condemned have a lot of punishments:

1. They don't get any pleasure, unless the other is willing.

2. Condemned Prey can't outrun Virtuous Predators.

3. Condemned Predators can't catch Virtuous Prey.

4. Condemned Predators can eat Condemned Prey, but they don't taste real good to them.

5. Condemned Prey feel pain when being eaten.

6. Animals that qualify as both Predator and Prey get both sets of punishments.

7. They get no pleasure from sex, unless the other is willing.


What's common to both is this:

1. They can talk.

2. Their bodies can reform.

3. For Non-Human, or Non-Antho, Animals, being marked as Virtuous or Condemned has to deal if they killed just to kill, killed way more than they could eat or horded way more than they could eat, which tends to get them marked as Condemned.

4. It's possible to change from being a Condemned to a Virtuous through doing Good Deeds, as well as the opposite, for a Virtuous to be Condemned for doing Evil Deeds. This is especially useful in the cases of those who are, more or less, border-lined.

5. There is plant matter that can be eaten by those who eat such things, but while those who were Virtuous enjoy the food, with it being rather flavorful, those who are Condemned find it to be tasteless.

6. Humans are Animals too, as are Anthros and both can fall into Virtuous or Condemned, and are classified as both Predator and Prey.

7. Technology seems to be similar to that of Stone-Age level, with clothes being made of Animal hide. Often times, Virtuous animals, especially those with enough hide to either make the equivalent of a shirt or a set of pants, will make a "donation" to help clothe Virtuous Humans, or Anthros that like to wear clothes.


The Setting:

The Setting isn't Fluffy Cloud Heaven, nor is it Fire and Brimstone Hell, which could be good or bad, depending upon one's point of view, but is instead more of a Natural and Unmodified world, similar to an animal's usual habitat, with a distinct lack of man-made buildings and structures. On the plus side, food is easy to find, as is shelter during the times it rains. Humans, upon finding out about the place, might be initially confused over the obvious differences between what they'd believed and actuality, tend to get used to things after a week or thereabouts, at least those who were Virtuous - as for the Condemned, this is but the start of their suffering.

Rules:

1. Spelling and Grammar are Important

2. Sex is allowed - hardly any rules, beyond that of Consent, at least for those who are Virtuous.

3. Vore is allowed, although Consent is required between Virtuous Predator and Virtuous Prey. Also, it is possible for the Predator to swallow the Prey whole, providing that the Predators is big enough to do so. A tiger, for instance, could swallow something the size of a human, but a fox would be unable to do so.

4. Plots must be story-driven, in one way, or another.

5. Always leave an option open, when possible - I'll add the others if need be.

6. Third-person point-of-view.

7. Anything else goes, unless I say otherwise.
